EmailTemplate.name: 18-Bus @ Cloud Spd-Peering Engineering-Email-EmailSeriesPeerng-T003Q5.Email 4.1
EmailTemplate.subject: Your gamers and streamers deserve the best experiences
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Optimize egress peering to deliver the best experience Our egress peering engineering (EPE) use case <[[http://pf.content.nokia.com/webscale-peering-hub/peering-epe-use-case?lb_email={{lead.Email Address}}&did=d000000001ei&utm_campaign=peering_engineering&utm_source=email-list-marketo-webscale&utm_medium=email&utm_content=epe-use-case&utm_term=peering-initial]]> outlines why @SnehalPatel1410 <[[https://twitter.com/SnehalPatel1410/status/1095852582113751046]]> likes the fact that our automated peering engineering supports Latency Steering Optimizer, AS Optimizer and Traffic Steering Optimizer. Just the sort of peering automation you need to keep your gaming and streaming customers happy. Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
